Question: In late 2006, this person was granted permanent resident status in the Bahamas by Immigration Minister Shane Gibson.
Hints: Both To the Limit and Skyscraper, and this person's performances in them, were critically panned.
Thirteen months after his marriage to this person, Marshall died at age 90 on August 4, 1995, in Houston.
After the coroner labeled the death "reserved," this person hired forensic pathologist Cyril Wecht to perform a second autopsy.
